title: How safe is it to find financial advisor? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A 🍷 I don't know what you mean by “safe” They are all safe!! They're not scam artists. They are there to help you but they also charge quite alot of money too. Don't forget their services are not free. So if you're needing a financial advisor they will be honest & trustworthy in Canada. If you're in a foreign land, l do not know! But seek one if you need one! Good Luck!

First ask around.Make sure they are licensed and check that they are really licensed and in good standing,also look to see if there are/were any disciplinary actions.Also make sure they are fiduciary this means they work for you not on commission for some other company
